title: Effigy Mounds National Monument: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger        Junior Rangers can collect badges from each National Park unit they visit. NPS Photo   Â    Junior Ranger  A free Junior Ranger Activity Booklet (31.4MB PDF) is available in the visitor center.  The activity booklet helps Jr. Rangers explore Effigy Mounds National Monument, develop and understanding and appreciation of the prehistoric American Indian people that inhabited the area, and experience the natural environment of the Upper Mississippi River Valley. A certificate and badge is presented to the Jr. Rangers upon completion of the activity book. WebRanger  The WebRanger program allows you to visit National Parks online.
